gov.nasa.jpf.vm

Class OVHeap

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.jpf.vm.GenericHeap
      • gov.nasa.jpf.vm.GenericSGOIDHeap
        • gov.nasa.jpf.vm.OVHeap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Heap, Iterable<ElementInfo>

    public class OVHeap
extends GenericSGOIDHeap
    a heap that implements search global object ids (SGOIDs) and uses a simple ObjVector to store ElementInfos. This is only efficient for small heaps with low fragmentation SGOID computation uses HashedAllocationContext, which means there is a chance of collisions, in which case a different heap type has to be used (we don't try to resolve collisions here)
